articles.description: Colin Farrell made a surprise cameo appearance on Saturday Night Live wearing a large mustache as a 'disguise' alongside guest host and fellow Irish actor, Brendan Gleeson.
articles.content:
Saturday Night Live was hosted by renowned Irish actor, Brendan Gleeson, to kick off the second episode of the sketch-comedy's 48th season.
